channel.title: Project Oblivion, Sacred fields
channel.description:
I Want to continue my oblivion project if you want to see the released version, here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586201.msg4162587.html#msg4162587]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586201.msg4162587.html#msg4162587[/url]P Oblivion i used a lovey delta to start this project.
The Project Name, might be changed to Asteria, if Lare allows me to. Some of my goals are to make a reliable/user friendly server...
Well i did bot testing and i could hold about 600 players, in about the 450 it started to lag a bit, also please have in mind that the computer where i ran it is really creepy it has 512mb ram, i just use it to run the server, here's a pic i took, not at the end though. [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/27xnrj9.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2r221ed.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/104nim8.png[/img] [size=18pt]Development Log[/size] [code] Added a task manager Added ShutDownHook, Saves all players in case the server crashes so no need to be saving Every 500ms thanks to lare/clawzfury Removed Packets from client. Added tiles for npc clipping at edgeville Added ISAACCipher class replacing cryption class, thanks to lare Starting to code smelting and firemaking with enums yay. Separated eating food from potions Re-named all files so they now start with caps yay [/code]

item.title: Project Oblivion, Sacred fields
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

There’s nothing wrong with taking inspiration from someone, other Private Servers, or even Video Games (the vidya gaem industry survives off doing just that). You just want to be sure it isn’t so similar that people start making accusations that you’ve copied something.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Oblivion, Sacred fields
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Mirrors RSPS Mirrors
item.description:
@RSPS_Mirrors wrote:

Still continue it, and maybe branch it away from relating to something else so similar.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Oblivion, Sacred fields
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:24, topic:466390”][quote author=RSPS Mirrors link=topic=581211.msg4157864#msg4157864 date=1352810747]

A Developer who puts this to shame. It’s exactly like his Story.

This what? im really confused.

They are saying you copied someone else’s idea.
[/quote]

Thanks. We’re not saying you copied it, but It’s almost EXACTLY the same as his. The Player is even rescued from the same situation.[/quote]
Well i didn’t copy it as it is oblivion start… You can look at youtube oblivion walktrough and pick the first one… its not too close but o well.
Thanks for the feedback though

Read full topic

item.title: Project Oblivion, Sacred fields
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“RSPS Mirrors, post:20, topic:466390”]Looks good, I’ve also been inspired by the Elder Scrolls (Skyrim) to create a server similar.

One thing I don’t understand is that the guard and wise old man randomly die. There’s no logic to why they die, so may I suggest you make something happen, like an earth quake (barrows camera shake) and some rocks fall down and kill them or something.[/quote]
Thanks for the feedback, i should add a gfx or something, they are supposed to use all their power to get you out of there and thats what you die…

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:21, topic:466390”][quote author=strucker link=topic=581211.msg4157665#msg4157665 date=1352785143]

The opening Story is exactly like Pat’s.

who the heck is pat?
[/quote]

A Developer who puts this to shame. It’s exactly like his Story.[/quote]
This what? im really confused.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Oblivion, Sacred fields
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:6, topic:466390”]Custom quests? What do you have in mind? Could you please share your ideas with the rest of us, that is if you feel comfortable doing so.

Good luck.[/quote]
Thanks, its not as custom as you think it’ll have some oblivion features as possible.

Team_Rocket:

Add a Developmental Log, example:

Im adding it.

[quote=“Kodiak, post:10, topic:466390”]i love oblivion

ot: good luck, i support cuz i can[/quote]

Thanks

runescape sucks:

I hope he incorporates a main storyline. That would be something epic to see in a private serber

Im trying to but that its kinda too tricky because of the buildings it already has… Right now im trying to remakee the Starting Jail at Draynor Sewer

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:8, topic:466390”]remake oblivion quests with side quests and a main quest

i would totally play that[/quote]
Grr, haha okayy.

OT: i’ve also removed the skill “progress” its looks sloppy

Read full topic

item.title: Project Oblivion, Sacred fields
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Add a Developmental Log, example:

Key: SS = Server-sided, CS = Client-sided

Past Updates:

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Combat removed from the Base. (SS)

  • Server contents packaged. (SS)

  • 40 new folders created in total. (SS)

  • Client class reduced to 184K.B. (SS)

  • Added a recreation of the 289 Revision’s Prayer Tab. (CS)

  • Player to Player Trading has been removed. (SS)

  • Text method optimized for grammar purposes. (SS)

  • New Debugging methods added. (SS/CS)

Read full topic
